title: MATLAB exams
content: Need all the info abt it. I had no idea that MATLAB exams will there too so didn't listen anything in Matlab.so how is the exam conducted n wt to study n for how much marks is the exam n wt should be basically do in exam....

comments.body: Just study the slides one day before the exam. U will be fine
Yeah atleast for us last year
They have told us that this year we have 10 marks worth mcqs and 10 marks worth descriptive questions
